description.zh-cn: 中国茶学家、茶学教育家、茶树栽培专家，曾任安徽农学院党委书记、教授。
description.en: Chinese tea scientist, tea science educator, and tea tree cultivation expert, who served as Party Secretary and professor at Anhui Agricultural College.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Zhejiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 一所位于中国安徽省的农业高等院校。
description.en: An agricultural college located in Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A major public research university in Shanghai, China.

nodes.id: 国务院学位委员会第二届学科评议组

zh-cn: 国务院学位委员会第二届学科评议组

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院学位委员会设立的专家组织，负责学位和研究生教育的指导、监督和评估。
description.en: An expert organization established by the Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the guidance, supervision, and evaluation of academic degrees and postgraduate education.
Wang Zhenheng was from Wenzhou, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽农学院党委书记、教授。
description.en: Served as Party Secretary and professor at Anhui Agricultural College.
